org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 StandaloneCompletedCheckpointStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.StandaloneCompletedCheckpointStore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CompletedCheckpointStore

    public class StandaloneCompletedCheckpointStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompletedCheckpointStore
    CompletedCheckpointStore for JobManagers running in HighAvailabilityMode.NONE.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • StandaloneCompletedCheckpointStore

        public StandaloneCompletedCheckpointStore(int maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain)
        Creates StandaloneCompletedCheckpointStore.
        参数:
        maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain - The maximum number of checkpoints to retain (at least 1). Adding more checkpoints than this results in older checkpoints being discarded.

    • 方法详细资料

      • recover

        public void recover()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        Recover available CompletedCheckpoint instances.

        After a call to this method, CompletedCheckpointStore.getLatestCheckpoint() returns the latest available checkpoint.

        指定者:
        recover 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addCheckpoint

        public void addCheckpoint(CompletedCheckpoint checkpoint)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        Adds a CompletedCheckpoint instance to the list of completed checkpoints.

        Only a bounded number of checkpoints is kept. When exceeding the maximum number of retained checkpoints, the oldest one will be discarded.

        指定者:
        addCheckpoint 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getLatestCheckpoint

        public CompletedCheckpoint getLatestCheckpoint()
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        Returns the latest CompletedCheckpoint instance or null if none was added.
        指定者:
        getLatestCheckpoint 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore

      • getAllCheckpoints

        public java.util.List<CompletedCheckpoint> getAllCheckpoints()
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        Returns all CompletedCheckpoint instances.

        Returns an empty list if no checkpoint has been added yet.

        指定者:
        getAllCheckpoints 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore

      • getNumberOfRetainedCheckpoints

        public int getNumberOfRetainedCheckpoints()
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore

        指定者:

        指定者:
        getMaxNumberOfRetainedCheckpoints 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(JobStatus jobStatus)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        Shuts down the store.

        The job status is forwarded and used to decide whether state should actually be discarded or kept.

        指定者:
        shutdown 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        参数:
        jobStatus - Job state on shut down
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • requiresExternalizedCheckpoints

        public boolean requiresExternalizedCheckpoints()
        从接口复制的说明: CompletedCheckpointStore
        This method returns whether the completed checkpoint store requires checkpoints to be externalized. Externalized checkpoints have their meta data persisted, which the checkpoint store can exploit (for example by simply pointing the persisted metadata).
        指定者:
        requiresExternalizedCheckpoints 在接口中 CompletedCheckpointStore
        返回:
        True, if the store requires that checkpoints are externalized before being added, false if the store stores the metadata itself.
